tasks.title: Diagnose and resolve the API rate limit issue with the `parse_prd` tool.
tasks.description: The `parse_prd` tool is currently failing due to a Gemini API rate limit. This task is to investigate the cause of the rate limit and find a solution to get the tool working again. This might involve checking API usage, implementing a backoff strategy, or exploring alternative solutions.

tasks.title: Solve the River Puzzle
tasks.description: Using the Taskmaster workflow, solve the 'River puzzle, goat, cabbage, wolf' logic puzzle.

tasks.title: Define the State Space
tasks.description: Represent all possible states of the puzzle. A state is defined by the location of the human, goat, cabbage, and wolf.

tasks.title: Identify Valid States
tasks.description: From the complete state space, identify all the valid states that do not violate the puzzle's rules.

tasks.title: Define State Transitions (Moves)
tasks.description: Define all possible moves (state transitions) that can be made. A move consists of the human rowing the boat from one bank to the other, either alone or with one item.

tasks.title: Find the Solution Path
tasks.description: Use a search algorithm to find a path from the initial state to the goal state, using only valid states and valid transitions.

tasks.title: Present the Solution
tasks.description: Clearly present the sequence of moves that solves the puzzle.
